verbs.description: California [V: does] n't like federal immigration law , the EPA or Trump 's tax law . Maybe it 's time for the Golden State to leave the union .
[ARG0: California] does [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: like] [ARG1: federal immigration law , the EPA or Trump 's tax law] . Maybe it 's time for the Golden State to leave the union .
California does n't like federal immigration law , the EPA or Trump 's tax law . [ARGM-ADV: Maybe] [ARG1: it] [V: 's] [ARG2: time for the Golden State to leave the union] .
California does n't like federal immigration law , the EPA or Trump 's tax law . Maybe it 's [ARGM-TMP: time] for [ARG0: the Golden State] to [V: leave] [ARG1: the union] .
